definition: a vehicle with two wheels powered by pedaling
sentence: I ride my bicycle to school every day.

definition: a person with whom one has a bond of mutual affection

sentence: The painting was exquisite in detail.
The project became a quagmire of complications.

definition: lasting for a very short time
sentence: The beauty of the sunset was ephemeral.

definition: a harsh, discordant mixture of sounds
sentence: The cacophony of the city was overwhelming.

definition: the occurrence of events by chance in a happy way
sentence: Finding that old photograph was pure serendipity.

definition: the realization that each random passerby is living a life as vivid and complex as your own
sentence: Walking through the crowded street filled me with a sense of sonder.

definition: a newly coined word or expression
sentence: The tech industry is full of neologisms.
